name: Abstract Clock : 0122
description:
Updates continuously to show current time in hours and seconds. Each minute the color shifts between gray and a random hue. 
Built using opensimplex library (https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_opensimplexnoise.html) and p5js. Noise octaves responds to the hour, noise period responds to the current minute and noise persistence responds to the current number of seconds.
